inclusion.criterion: Adult patients 40 years of age or older who present to the Emergency Department
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Subjects must read and speak English or Spanish
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Subjects must have a working phone number and fixed address
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patient who have a syncope mimic such as seizure, stroke, head trauma with loss of consciousness
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patients who have a new serious diagnosis found in the Emergency Department
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has history of CAD and prior MI, HLD, HTN, ventricular tachycardia, and syncope. Recently discharged after negative work-up for syncope.
